54612760232135645.Text: I know your stance on this, Dalin! My brother speaks out of turn. It seems there is only one way for us to settle this. It is a time-honored Norvayne family tradition. Do not interfere, stranger. When our decision is made, we will let you know.

138152507038544632.Text: Enough, Daris! Please excuse my brother. It seems there is only one way for us to settle this. It is a time-honored Norvayne family tradition. Please, do not interfere. When our decision is made, we will let you know.
